      • findRootByObserveableId

        public static org.jacpfx.api.component.Perspective<javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>,javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object> findRootByObserveableId(java.lang.String id,

        find the parent perspective to id; should be only used when no responsible component was found ,

        perspectives - the perspective list
